select id, lsh, mxh, gsm_goods_id, ph, pch, cost_price, quantity, purchase_tax_rate, sell_tax_rate, pem_supplier_id, iym_inventory_add_id, sys_clinic_id, creator_id, creation_date from flm_payable_account

select a.*, ifnull(b.paidAmount, 0) as paidAmount from ( select creationDate, lsh, pemSupplierId, pemSupplierOid, pemSupplierName, sum(quantity * costPrice) as payableAmount, creatorId, creatorName, sysClinicId, sysClinicName from view_flm_payable_account
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(pemSupplierId = #{pemSupplierId}) and
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
group by lsh ) a left join ( select flm_payable_account_lsh, sum(ifnull(quantity * cost_price, 0)) as paidAmount from flm_paid_account group by flm_payable_account_lsh ) b on a.lsh = b.flm_payable_account_lsh
((a.payableAmount - ifnull(b.paidAmount, 0)) >= #{arrearagesAmount}) and
order by a.creationDate desc

select a.*, (a.quantity - ifnull(b.paidQuantity, 0)) as payableQuantity, ifnull(inventoryQuantity, 0) as inventoryQuantity from ( select * from view_flm_payable_account where lsh = #{lsh} ) a left join ( select id, iym_inventory_add_id, flm_payable_account_lsh, sum(ifnull(quantity, 0)) as paidQuantity from flm_paid_account group by iym_inventory_add_id, flm_payable_account_lsh ) b on a.iymInventoryAddId = b.iym_inventory_add_id and a.lsh = b.flm_payable_account_lsh left join ( select id, iym_inventory_add_id, sum(ifnull(quantity, 0)) as inventoryQuantity from iym_inventory where split_quantity = 1 group by iym_inventory_add_id ) c on a.iymInventoryAddId = c.iym_inventory_add_id
